room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Arlington in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Are you good with mysteries, like hidden object games, good at solving riddles,then this is really fun and exciting to do. You will enjoy this fun filled hour of trying tp figure out who did it...remember you're on the clock and you only have an hour to solve the mystery. I can't wait to get back there and fo another one.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Arlington in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did this as a team buolder for my work, but I will be bringing my family back. We had so much fun and the challenges were hard but not impossible. The staff was extremely friendly and willing to work with us to make the experience exactly what we wanted. I highly recommend them!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Arlington in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: A good experience. We went with 8 people in all, and there was a lot to do, but it would have been about the same if we only had 4.There were a few times that I didn't get the logical connection from one clue to another, but it didn't hurt the experience.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Arlington in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My friends and I had a great time at breakout, mary was very kind and a great hostess. The staff there was also very helpful and kind to assist us with the check in process.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Arlington in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We have done more than 50 escape rooms and this company had some puzzles that we have never seen before. We were very impressed. I did this with just my husband- the two of us. We managed to get out with 10 minutes to spare from the Mystery Mansion. We had a wonderful game master, Mary. I recommend this escape room! Just a note though- it's in the Parks Mall. So if you don't want others to join your room, you might have to buy out the room or book last minute. There could be walk-ups added to your room.
